title: Where a proposed DP Road or Regular line of street passes through the CDS area, the entire FSI admissible under this Regulation for the area of the road may be given in the same Scheme
clause_text: Where a proposed DP Road or Regular line of street passes through the CDS area, the entire FSI admissible under this Regulation for the area of the road may be given in the same Scheme.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Where a proposed DP Road or Regular line of street passes through the CDS area, the entire FSI admissible under this Regulation for the area of the road may be given in the same Scheme.
